ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... that s the point.  none of us can know how big the problem really is.  we don t have enough data.  but verant can and does.  which is why they prioritize
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:50 AM 8/24/00 -0600, you wrote:

>I was only counting the people I know in RL personally. I doubt anyone
>knows an appropriate sample size in that way. From seeing the boards
>though, there are hundreds of posts on bard song bugs, very few on having
>one's own corpse poof.
>
> Kit


that's the point. none of us can know how big the problem really is. we don't
have enough data. but verant can and does. which is why they prioritize the bug
fixes/feature adds and we don't. when you say ''from seeing the boards'', i assume
you go to all the class specific and the sony boards and you don't see hundreds of
posts from other classes on bugs or people posting on general bugs that need fixing
too? or do you just read the bard board?
